title: Name one thing the entire Rogue class can do against N'zoth.
body:
Blade Flurry was gutted so our AoE clears are FoK, Dark Iron, and Vanish. 

FoK and Dark Iron do nothing. Vanish refills my opponent's hand with value (and another N'zoth).

You can't no-kill remove Skillvanas/Cairn/Tirion because rogues can't do that

Boy I love this
